function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contraction of the German economy due to COVID-19 impacts on the building industry and construction operations.","Impact":"Decreased economic growth, increased financial strain, and potential job losses within the building industry.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety measures, financial support for affected businesses, and infrastructure investment.","Technologies":"Digital monitoring and control systems, contactless access technologies, and remote working solutions.","People":"Founders, developers, contractors, subcontractors, supply chain suppliers, and construction workers.","Owner":"Government, building industry associations, and construction companies."},{"Description":"Disruptions and slowdown of supplies and labor availability in the building industry due to COVID-19.","Impact":"Delayed construction projects, increased costs, and potential project suspensions or terminations.","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers, implementation of safety protocols, and investment in alternative supply chain options.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, remote monitoring tools, and automated construction systems.","People":"Supply chain suppliers, construction workers, and project managers.","Owner":"Construction companies, project developers, and supply chain stakeholders."},{"Description":"Fluctuation of building operations in states and cities based on essential sector classification and COVID-19 impacts.","Impact":"Uncertainty in project continuity, labor force management issues, and financial instability for construction firms.","Mitigation":"Clear communication with authorities, adherence to health guidelines, and adaptation of project schedules.","Technologies":"Project management software, virtual collaboration platforms, and IoT-based workforce management systems.","People":"Project managers, construction workers, and building industry stakeholders.","Owner":"Government authorities, construction companies, and project management teams."}]}
